segments.text: I notice a boy standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching his arm as far as it can go, trying to grab a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the determination on his face as he balances precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in his other hand, probably to catch the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he's done this before or if it's his first time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors are wide open, giving him easy access to the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The counter below is clear, which must be why he thought it was safe to climb up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed him yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really pushing his luck with this risky move.
segments.speaker: PAR
